level.heading: Naval battalion not affected.
level.text: Nothing contained in this subtitle shall be held to alter the status or organization of the naval battalion as now provided for by law.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2 of National Guard Tuition Assistance Clarification Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-387, May 5, 2010, 57 DCR 4325).

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: The reference to "this subtitle" in this section includes all sections of Subtitle I of Title 49 except §§ 49-217, 49-303, and 49-906.
